channel.title: Naked & Afraid
channel.description:
Sorry if you guys thought this was something else! :P
This is a new tv show that had a season premiere the other day after the skywire event at the canyon. Pretty much what it is about is one man/woman will be NAKED and have to survive for 21 days in some random dangerous place. Both people are survival experts from what I understand. Both of these people get no outside help and must cope with that difficulty of surviving 21 days with nothing.

item.title: Naked & Afraid
item.dc:creator: @Porygon Porygon
item.description:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:3, topic:522852”][quote author=Lin link=topic=641348.msg4320790#msg4320790 date=1372190935]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=641348.msg4320780#msg4320780 date=1372190229]
Sorry if you guys thought this was something else!
[/quote]Yeah I thought this was gonna be a bad picso where an underage girl was kidnapped and about to be raped. Disappointed =\

[/quote]now would I post something about that? :|[/quote]
Maybe… Yeah it sounds okay.

Read full topic

@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:1, topic:522852”]Sorry if you guys thought this was something else! :P[/quote]Yeah I thought this was gonna be a porno where an underage girl was kidnapped and about to be raped. Disappointed =\
